meanings.definition: To perceive or detect an odor with the nose.
meanings.sent1: She smells the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bakery smells of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent3: The detective smells trouble in the air.
meanings.sent4: His suspicion smells like a rat.
meanings.sent5: The scent of roses smells sweet and inviting.

meanings.definition: A distinctive odor, especially a pleasant one.
meanings.sent1: The delicious smells from the kitchen made her hungry.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh cookies filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The enticing smells of popcorn drew everyone to the movie theater.
meanings.sent4: The smell of success lingered in the air after the presentation.
meanings.sent5: The comforting smell of home-cooked meals brings back memories.

meanings.sent1: Her smells helped her identify the different flowers.
meanings.sent2: His keen sense of smell allowed him to detect the gas leak.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's superpower was his extraordinary smells.
meanings.sent4: In the world of perfumery, a good smell can be worth a fortune.
meanings.sent5: The loss of his smells due to a cold made everything taste bland.
